did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Knights of Labor vs. Troy (NY) Stove Works Scrapbook, 1886-1904
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor- Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Scrapbook documenting the Knights of Labor boycott of the Fuller and Warren Stove Company of Troy, New York, from 1886 to 1889.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a scrapbook documenting the Knights of Labor boycott of the Fuller and Warren Stove Company of Troy, New York, from 1886 to 1889. Included in the scrapbook are newspaper clippings, leaflets, broadsides, and other documents relating to the dispute, as well as a few loose letters and newspaper clippings.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Knights of Labor vs. Troy (NY) Stove Works Scrapbook #5890. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
